name: TileDynasty FPS Arena
description: Looking to bring the old arcade-game feeling back from nostalgia. Bunny hopping is taken to the next level with smooth movement, allowing you to navigate fluidly through the maps, while defeating your opponents!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel i5 Processor 2.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Video card supporting shader model 3.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel i7 Processor 2.4 GHz+ Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Video card supporting shader model 3.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
